nodes.text: Dornea was the homeworld of the Dornean species. The native species designed the Braha'tok-class gunship, which were manufactured by the Dornean Braha'ket Fleetworks Conglomerate to protect Dornea from the Galactic Empire Some of these gunships saw service with the Rebel Alliance during the early rebellion against the Empire. After the Alliance secured a decisive victory at the Battle of Yavin, Dornea joined their cause and brought more Braha'tok-class gunships with them.

The gunships continued to protect the Dornean homeworld after the fall of the Empire. In 34 ABY, the The Rebel Files were uncovered during an excavation on Durkteel and eventually reached the Resistance, a private military with roots to the Rebel Alliance. Admiral Ushos O. Statura questioned wrote a note in a section on the Braha'tok-class gunship, questioning who still used them. Admiral Gial Ackbar left a note reply that Dornea still used the vessels.

Dornea was first mentioned in the 2017 canon boxset and reference book Star Wars: The Rebel Files, written by Daniel Wallace. In Star Wars Legends continuity, Dornea first appeared in the 1996 novel Before the Storm, written by Michael P. Kube-McDowell.
